author: Special Correspondent
text:
Retd. Officers for election duty

The Chennai district election office has planned to use the services of retired government employees ahead of this Assembly election.

There are 9 sanctioned posts for deputy tahsildars in the Election Department and all of them are vacant, officials said. The electoral roll purification drive continues to be affected at the field level in all the 16 Assembly constituencies in Chennai District.

To tackle this, District Election Officer and Corporation Commissioner Vikram Kapur has invited retired deputy tahsildars and assistants to send in their applications to District Revenue Officer (Elections), Chennai Corporation. - Special Correspondent
title: Retired officers to be deployed on election duty
